nodes.text: Star Wars: I Am a Stormtrooper
Star Wars: I Am a Stormtrooper is a canon young-readers book. It was written by Christopher Nicholas and published by Golden Books on January 3, 2017.
Meet the dreaded stormtroopers from the Star Wars saga in this Little Golden Book!

Meet the dreaded stormtroopers from the epic Star Wars space saga! Featuring stunning retro illustrations, this book is perfect for Star Wars—and Little Golden Book—fans of all ages. It includes epic scenes from A New Hope, The Empire Strikes Back, Return of the Jedi, and The Force Awakens.
